author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Obseva Reports Q1 Loss Per Share $0.54
text:
May 16 (Reuters) - Obseva SA:
* OBSEVA REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS AND PROVIDES BUSINESS UPDATE
* Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.54 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.47 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SAYS AS OF MARCH 31, 2018, OBSEVA HAD CASH AND CASH EQUIVALENTS OF $95.4 MILLION. Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
